title: Rush 1979.06.04 Rushian Roulette Pink Pop Festival FM FLAC
description:
Rush
June 4, 1979
"Rushian Roulette, Fixed"
Pink Pop Festival, Geleen, Holland
Metal Memory:  MM 90018

01 - A Passage To Bangkok (3:57)
02 - Xanadu (12:38)
03 - The Trees (5:18)
04 - Closer To The Heart (4:12)
05 - La Villa Strangiato (10:08)
06 - 2112 Discovery/Soliloquy, Grand Finale (9:05)
08 - Something For Nothing (3:15)

The original version of this legendary soundboard show had a tracking issue with Xanadu and The Trees.  In the original release, Xanadu was 11:43 and The Trees was 6:12, but the tail end of Xanadu carried over to the start of The Trees.  This "fixed" version corrects that oddity.  For the record, I converted the original SHNs to WAV using xAct, edited the tracks using Audacity, exported the tracks as WAV files and then encoded the two new WAV files (Tracks 2 and 3) as SHNs.  I also created new checksums.  In all other respects, the show is identical to the original release.
